titles.title: A bill providing for resolutions making continuing appropriations for a fiscal year to be delivered to the President as a series of separate resolutions.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.

bill.summary: 8/5/1987--Introduced. Requires that a resolution making continuing appropriations for a fiscal year which is adopted by the Congress be delivered to the President as a series of separate resolutions (line-item veto).
